broadcasts.message: CORRECTION: Neo4j was never an option. RuVector has native graph capabilities via ruvector-graph Rust crate and @ruvector/graph-node npm bindings. All agents should focus on RuVector-native solutions only.

HIVE DISCUSSION: Research RuVector documentation (GitHub + ruv.net) to understand full feature set for user data storage. Focus on: graph capabilities, vector search, learning features, persistence options. We want to leverage RuVector-native solutions, NOT external databases like Neo4j.
All agents: Write findings to your assigned markdown file INCREMENTALLY. Do not wait until done. Each section should be appended immediately after research. Files persist across compaction.
